channel.title: Logs me out when using spec! help!
channel.description: Ok, I've decided to re-add them, I'm guessing I might have missed an important void or something.

item.title: Logs me out when using spec! help!
item.dc:creator: @sp3c sp3c
item.description:
@sp3c wrote:

Ok well one error in this code: int offsetX = (casterX - EnemyX) * -1; int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY) * -1;

I got the error: cannot find variable EnemyX and then cannot find variable EnemyY. So I changed the enemyY and enemyX to fenemyY and fenemyX

I dont know if that would hurt…

Read full topic
item.source: Logs me out when using spec! help!

item.title: Logs me out when using spec! help!
item.dc:creator: @sp3c sp3c
item.description:
@sp3c wrote:

U know u’ve done it… and dont post if ur not helping. Ok can someone please help out? If you need to…feel free to pm me with some questions for what i might have done wrong.

item.source: Logs me out when using spec! help!

item.title: Logs me out when using spec! help!
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

[quote=“sp3c, post:1, topic:151061”]Ok, I’ve been trying to add specs for a while, and I always got 100 errors. Well this time I didn’t cause I got smart enough in coding to figure out where to put everything lol. Well I am still left with 7 errors, after getting 11 at first. Here they are:

client.java:24537: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyX location: class client int offsetX = (casterX - EnemyX) * -1; ^ client.java:24538: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyY location: class client int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY) * -1; ^ client.java:24823: stillgfx(int,int,int) in client cannot be applied to (int,int ,int,int,int,int,int,int,int) stillgfx(256, 256, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, AttackingOn, EnemyY, EnemyX); ^ client.java:27840: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyX location: class client int offsetX = (casterX - EnemyX) * -1; ^ client.java:27841: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyY location: class client int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY) * -1; ^ client.java:27867: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyY2 location: class client animation(341, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); ^ client.java:27867: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyX2 location: class client animation(341, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 7 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Can anyone help me with these? Thx[br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2007, 04:45:34 PM[/size][hr]Can some1 please help out? It would be awesome if u could…[br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2007, 05:18:37 PM[/size][hr]Worked it down to 2 now…Can’t figure them out.

client.java:27831: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyX location: class client int offsetX = (casterX - EnemyX) * -1; ^ client.java:27832: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyY location: class client int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY) * -1; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

How is enemyx and enemyy not declared? They are in so many other things…[/quote][quote=“sp3c, post:3, topic:151061”]OMG WOOT!!! I fixed everything by myself for once lol, no help =) Specs work w00tness.[br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2007, 07:34:26 PM[/size][hr]Ok big problem now…dangit! When I try to attack another player with the spec, it logs each of them out and says this in the runserver:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at client.Attack(client.java:24541) at client.process(client.java:17719) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47)[/quote]
Seriously,Is there a need to double post?

Read full topic
item.source: Logs me out when using spec! help!

OMG WOOT!!! I fixed everything by myself for once lol, no help =) Specs work w00tness.[br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2007, 07:34:26 PM[/size][hr]Ok big problem now…dangit! When I try to attack another player with the spec, it logs each of them out and says this in the runserver:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at client.Attack(client.java:24541) at client.process(client.java:17719) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47)

Read full topic

item.description:
@Khasck wrote:

[quote=“sp3c, post:1, topic:151061”]Ok, I’ve been trying to add specs for a while, and I always got 100 errors. Well this time I didn’t cause I got smart enough in coding to figure out where to put everything lol. Well I am still left with 7 errors, after getting 11 at first. Here they are:

client.java:24537: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyX location: class client int offsetX = (casterX - EnemyX) * -1; ^ client.java:24538: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyY location: class client int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY) * -1; ^ client.java:24823: stillgfx(int,int,int) in client cannot be applied to (int,int ,int,int,int,int,int,int,int) stillgfx(256, 256, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, AttackingOn, EnemyY, EnemyX); ^ client.java:27840: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyX location: class client int offsetX = (casterX - EnemyX) * -1; ^ client.java:27841: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyY location: class client int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY) * -1; ^ client.java:27867: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyY2 location: class client animation(341, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); ^ client.java:27867: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyX2 location: class client animation(341, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 7 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Can anyone help me with these? Thx[br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2007, 04:45:34 PM[/size][hr]Can some1 please help out? It would be awesome if u could…[br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2007, 05:18:37 PM[/size][hr]Worked it down to 2 now…Can’t figure them out.

client.java:27831: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyX location: class client int offsetX = (casterX - EnemyX) * -1; ^ client.java:27832: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyY location: class client int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY) * -1; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

How is enemyx and enemyy not declared? They are in so many other things…[/quote] serach that deleted or google it.
